PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-05882024-05-24ISED, NRC
ActFederal Public Sector Labour Relations Act
SubjectNational Research Council - Public Service Alliance of Canada ** Collective Agreement **
PrecisOrder approving the ENTRY by the National Research Council into a COLLECTIVE AGREEMENT with the PUBLIC SERVICE ALLIANCE OF CANADA that covers all employees in the INFORMATION SERVICES group, for the period beginning on June 21, 2022 and ending on June 20, 2026.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order approving the ENTRY by the National Research Council into a COLLECTIVE AGREEMENT with the PUBLIC SERVICE ALLIANCE OF CANADA that covers all employees in the INFORMATION SERVICES group, for the period beginning on June 21, 2022 and ending on June 20, 2026.
